<Text: Taskasaplidis (Greek:Τασκασαπλίδης) is a Greek last name (or family name).>
Triplets:<Taskasaplidis
1:
--------------------
Text: Taskasaplidis:  It is believed that the name derived from a local area of the city of Istanbul (formerly Constantinople) Turkey, called "Taşkasap (Tashkasap)".
Triplets:<Taskasaplidis
2:
--------------------
Text: Taskasaplidis:  The patronymic suffix -idis, used mostly from Greeks in the Pontus and Asia Minor regions.
Triplets:<Taskasaplidis
4:
--------------------
Text: Taskasaplidis:  For example, the common Greek family name "Tokatlidis", uses the infix -li (also the suffix -idis) and the name derives from the city name Tokat (Greek:Τοκάτη), Turkey.
Triplets:<Taskasaplidis
